column4: hi, problem from a noob regarding a very old install of pidgin I just can't get to uninstall
it is one of the few programs I manually compiled
everything i've seen on the forums doesn't seem to work
I finally tried to sudo -r rm the directory
and its gone, yet it still opens....
I really want to upgrade past 2.0.0
type which pidgin in a terminal
make sure it's not a symlink first
a symlink will show up with ->
if it wasn't a symlink before, it may be now :-D
i think it might be a symlink now pestilenc
